overview:
Igor Kim is a Managing Partner at GIV Capital

GIV Capital is a Moscow based VC firm with a focus on early stage internet investments.

Prior to joining GIV Igor has worked at Morgan Stanley where he has participated in financing, capital markets and M&A transactions in excess of US$ 2 billion, most recently taking Yandex public on Nasdaq

Before Morgan Stanley, Igor worked at Credit Suisse in London, focused on Emerging Markets Coverage

Igor holds a BSc in Management from University of London, Royal Holloway
